text: atta, prayanikara ondu tandavu bandu, tamagagi niru tumbuvatanannu (yusuph‌rannu eseyalagidda baviya balige) kalisidaru. Avanu tanna kodavannu ilisidanu (mattu) ‘‘ido illide subhavarte. Illobba balakaniddane’’ endu ghosisidanu. Taruvaya avaru avarannu (yusuph‌rannu) vyaparada sarakendu pariganisi adagisittaru. Avaru maduttidda ellavannu allahanu aritiddanu
